nodes.text: Wrencess was a male bounty hunter whose seductive advances were never rejected by any individual of any species. To pursue bounties, Wrencess would take weeks to romantically engage his targets before revealing his goal. Wrencess was mentioned in the Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook's Imperial edition in a section called "The Hunt," written by Guild member Ro-San Borokki. The handbook used Wrencess as an example of the variety of approaches a bounty hunter could take to capture their targets.
Wrencess was mentioned in The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett, a 2013 in-universe reference book by Daniel Wallace, Ryder Windham, and Jason Fry.
